column4: *help* I just started to install Ubuntu (i386) on my old computer.  It partitioned my drive and then it stopped at 100% and it's been at that screen for like the past 30 minutes.  Should I just restart and try again?
I just downloaded the CD off bittorrent and burnt it using Roxio Toast on my Powerbook.
it verified properly as well, so I'll just restart it and see what happens
move through your virtual terminals (ctrl-alt F3 - F6) and see if there are any error messages.
